channel.title: How to access NPCHandler so I can use with my quests
channel.description: I am trying to set it up in one of my quests classes so when you kill an npc you get your reward, but how would I go about adding the int i from the NPCHandler class? So like, [code] if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 83) { [/code] How would I make that int i, work like the one in NPCHandler, but yet run out of the NPCHandler class?

item.title: How to access NPCHandler so I can use with my quests

item.title: How to access NPCHandler so I can use with my quests
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

for (int i = 0; i < NPCHandler.npcs[i].npcType; i++) {
    // Your 'if' block.
}

Read full topic
